response.original_title: The Dark Reality of Life on Easter Island
response.overview: Beyond the famous Moai heads, lies the untold story of a community fighting for survival against the forces of the outside world. Join me as I attempt to uncover the island's history of exploitation and explore the threats putting its future in doubt.
response.tagline: Beyond the famous Moai heads, lies the untold story of a community fighting for survival against the forces of the outside world. Join me as I attempt to uncover the island's history of exploitation and explore the threats putting its future in doubt.
response.title: The Dark Reality of Life on Easter Island
